mapper.select: select a.ID as id, a.Admin_id as adminid, a.Admin_power as adminpower, a.Admin_name as adminname, a.Admin_area as adminarea, a.Admin_phone as adminphone, a.Admin_area_city as adminareacity, a.Admin_Area_city as admincityid, CONVERT(varchar, a.admin_dl_time , 120 ) as admindltime, p.Power_name as adminpowername, p.Power_w as adminpowerw from tower_admin a left join tower_power p on a.Admin_power=p.id where 1=1 and a.Admin_id=#{adminid} and a.Admin_psd=#{password};

select a.ID as id, a.Admin_id as adminid, a.Admin_power as adminpower, a.Admin_name as adminname, a.Admin_area as adminarea, a.Admin_phone as adminphone, CONVERT(varchar, a.admin_dl_time , 120 ) as admindltime from tower_admin a where 1=1 and a.ID=#{adminid}
select count(1) from tower_admin where 1=1 and ID=#{id}
mapper.update: update tower_admin set Admin_power=#{adminpower}, Admin_city=#{ admincity}, Admin_area=#{ adminarea}, Admin_name=#{ adminname}， where ID=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from (select *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY orderbytime desc) as rank from ( select a.ID as id, (case when len( a.title )>33 then left ( a.title ,30)+'...' else a.title end ) as title, CONVERT(varchar, a.publishtime,23) as publishtime, b.Admin_name as publishername, a.publishtime as orderbytime from tower_notice a LEFT JOIN tower_admin b on a.publisher = b.id ) w1)as tm where tm.rank between 1 and 5 ;

select * from (select *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY orderbytime desc) as rank from ( select a.ID as id, (case when len('('+b.Admin_name+') '+a.title)>35 then left('('+b.Admin_name+') '+a.title,33)+'...' else '('+b.Admin_name+') '+a.title end) as title, CONVERT(varchar, a.messagetime,23) as messagetime, b.Admin_name as messagername, c.Power_name as powername , a.messagetime as orderbytime from tower_message a LEFT JOIN tower_admin b on a.messager = b.id LEFT JOIN tower_power c on b.Admin_power = c.id ) w1)as tm where tm.rank between 1 and 5;
